pages.text: Aap kehydijiye kay Woh ALLAH TaALA aik(hi)hai
Na uss say koi paida hoa na who kisi say paida hoa
Aur na koi uska humser hai
Aap kehdijiye! Kay mein subha ky Rab ki panah mein aata hun
Her uss cheez ky shar say jo uss nay paida ki hai
Aur andheri raat ki tareki kay shar say jab uska andhera phel jaye
Aur girah(laga ker inn)mein phonknay walon kay sher say(bhi)
Aur hasad kerney waly ki burai say bhi jab wo hasad karey
Sab tareef Allah Taalaa kay liye hai jo tamam jahanon ka palney wala hai
Bara meharban nihayat reham kerney wala
Badlay kay din (yani qayamat) ka maalik hai

Hum sirf teri hi ibadat kertay hain aur sirf tujh hi say madad chahatay hain Shuroo Allah kay naam say jo bara meharban nehayat reham kerney wala hai 114.1. Aap kehdijiey!kay mein logo kay parwardigar ki panah mein ata hun 114.2. Logon ky malik ki(aur) 114.3. Logon ky maabood ki(Panah mein) 114.4. Waswasa dalney waly pechy hut janey waly kay shar say
Jo logon kay seenon mein waswasa daalta hai
(Khua) woh jinn mein say ho ya insaan mein say
